titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Propiconazole.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/25/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily provide for the duty treatment of Propiconazole.
